abort.single_instance_allowed: iCloud3 is already installed and can not be installed again. Select CONFIGURE in the iCloud3 Integration entry to configure iCloud3
abort.login_error: An error occurred logging into the iCloud account. Verify the username and password.
abort.reauth_successful: The reauthentication has been successfully completed. Ignore the `Aborted` heading on this form.

error.auth: The auth token provided is not valid
error.invalid_path: The path provided is not valid. Should be in the format `user/repo-name`
error.invalid_verification_code: The Apple ID Verification Code is invalid
error.icloud_no_devices: No devices were found in the iCloud 'Family Sharing' list
error.icloud_other_error: An unknown error was encountered authenticating the iCloud account. Try again later

abort.no_device: None of your devices have "Find my iPhone" activated
abort.reauth_successful: The reauthentication has been successfully completed. Ignore the `Aborted` heading on this form.

error.icloud_logged_into: Successfully Logged into the iCloud Account
error.icloud_invalid_auth: iCloud Account Login Failed, Check Username & Password
error.icloud_acct_not_set_up: The iCloud Account Username/Password have not been set up
error.send_verification_code: Failed to send the Apple ID Verification Code
error.invalid_verification_code: The Apple ID Verification Code is invalid. Requested a new code
error.not_numeric: The value entered is not numeric
error.stat_zone_base_lat_range_error: The value must be between -90 and 90
error.stat_zone_base_long_range_error: The value must be between -180 and 180
error.required_field_device: At least one device (Family Share List, Find-my-Friends, iOS App device must be specified
error.unknown_devicename: The device that was previously selected can no longer be identified. It`s name may have been changed or it may have been deleted. Reselect the device to be tracked or monitored
error.unknown_value: The value of this parameter in the iCloud3 configuration file is unknown or invalid. It must be selected again
error.display_text_as_no_gtsign: The '>' between the ActualText and DisplayAsText is missing
error.duplicate_ic3_devicename: This name is already used by another iCloud3 device
error.duplicate_other_devicename: This name is already used in another integration or platform

data.fname: Friendly Name, Sensor Entity Name Prefix

data_description.text_to: DISPLAYED TEXT > Text to be displayed

menu_options.action_pause: • PAUSE > Pause polling on all devices
menu_options.action_resume: • RESUME > Resume Polling on all devices, Refresh all locations
menu_options.action_reauth: • AUTHENTICATE ICLOUD > Enter iCloud Verification Code
menu_options.action_reset_icloud: • RESET ICLOUD > Reset iCloud Interface, Reauthenticate
menu_options.action_goto_menu2: • MORE > Waze Database Tools, Export Event Log
menu_options.action_exit: • EXIT > Return to the Main Menu

menu_options.action_waze_db_recalc: • WAZE HIST DATABASE > Recalc time/distance data at midnight
menu_options.action_waze_db_track: • WAZE HIST MAP TRACK > Load route locations for map display
menu_options.action_evlog_export: • EXPORT EVENT LOG > Export Event Log data
menu_options.action_exit: • EXIT > Return to the Main Menu

data_description.unit_of_measurement: UNIT OF MEASUREMENT > Display distance values in this unit of measurement
data_description.max_interval: MAXIMUM INTERVAL TIME > The maximum interval between location update requests
data_description.gps_accuracy_threshold: GPS ACCURACY THRESHOLD > Locations with GPS Accuracy above this value will be discarded, a new location will be requested
data_description.old_location_threshold: OLD LOCATION THRESHOLD > Locations older than this value will be discarded, a new location will be requested
data_description.travel_time_factor: TRAVEL TIME FACTOR > The next location request time is determined by multiplying the Waze travel time by this value
data_description.log_level: LOG LEVEL > Specifies the type of messages that are added to the HA log file.

data.discard_poor_gps_inzone: Discard Location Updates with Poor GPS Accuracy when in a Zone
data.center_in_zone: Change Device's Location to the Zone's Center when in a Zone

data_description.default: INZONE INTERVAL > The interval between device location requests when the device is in a zone
data_description.iphone: INZONE INTERVAL-IPHONE > The default inZone Interval for an iPhone & iPod
data_description.ipad: INZONE INTERVAL-IPAD > The default inZone Interval for an iPad
data_description.watch: INZONE INTERVAL-WATCH > The default inZone Interval for an Apple Watch
data_description.airpods: INZONE INTERVAL-AIRPODS > The default inZone Interval for AirPods
data_description.no_iosapp: INZONE INTERVAL-NO IOS APP > The default inZone Interval when the iOS App is not installed on the iPhone, iPad, Watch, etc.

data.waze_realtime: Consider Traffic delays when determining the Waze Travel Time

data_description.distance_method: ZONE DISTANCE METHOD > Method used to determine the distance to a tracked zone
data_description.waze_region: ROUTE SERVER > Waze Route Server location
data_description.waze_min_distance: WAZE MINIMUM DISTANCE > Waze Route Service is used when the zone distance is greater than this value
data_description.waze_max_distance: WAZE MAXIMUM DISTANCE > Calculation distance method is used if the zone distance is greater than this value

data.waze_history_database_used: Save Waze Route Info to the Waze History Database

data_description.waze_history_max_distance: WAZE HISTORY DB MAXIMUM DISTANCE > Do not save the time/distance information if the zone distance is greater than this value
data_description.waze_history_track_direction: WAZE LOCATION MAP DISPLAY > The locations (gps) saved in the Waze History Database can be displayed on a map in a north-to-south or east-to-west direction

data_description.stat_zone_still_time: STILL TIME > Time the device is in the same location before it is placed in a Stationary Zone
data_description.stat_zone_inzone_interval: INZONE INTERVAL > Time interval between location requests when the device is in a Stationary Zone
data_description.stat_zone_base_latitude: BASE LOCATION LATITUDE > Distance (km) north or south of the Home Zone or the actual GPS Latitude
data_description.stat_zone_base_longitude: BASE LOCATION LONGITUDE > Distance (km) east or west of the Home Zone or the actual GPS Longitude

data.control: SENSOR CONTROL - Special methods for creating sensors
data.device: DEVICE SENSORS - Device status and information
data.tracking_update: LOCATION UPDATE SENSORS - Device location update times
data.track_from_zones: TRACK FROM MULTIPLE ZONE SENSORS - Used when tracking from more than one zone (not needed for tracking only from the Home zone)
data.tracking_other: OTHER TRACKING SENSORS - Not normally used but available
data.zone: ZONE SENSORS - Device zone status and information
data.other: OTHER SENSORS - Sensors not in the above areas

sensors.title: Device and Tracking Sensors created by iCloud3
